name: trip_record
doc: Schema for yellow taxi trip records from NYC TLC data. [http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/about/trip_record_data.shtml]

fields.name: VendorID
fields.doc: A code indicating the TPEP provider that provided the record. 1: Creative Mobile Technologies, LLC 2: VeriFone Inc.

fields.name: tpep_pickup_datetime
fields.doc: The date and time when the meter was engaged.

fields.name: tpep_dropoff_datetime
fields.doc: The date and time when the meter was disengaged.

fields.name: passenger_count
fields.doc: The number of passengers in the vehicle. This is a driver-entered value.

fields.name: trip_distance
fields.doc: The elapsed trip distance in miles reported by the taximeter.

fields.name: pickup_longitude
fields.doc: Longitude where the meter was engaged.

fields.name: pickup_latitude
fields.doc: Latitude where the meter was engaged.

fields.name: RateCodeID
fields.doc: The final rate code in effect at the end of the trip. 1: Standard rate, 2:JFK, 3:Newark, 4:Nassau or Westchester, 5:Negotiated fare, 6:Group ride

fields.name: store_and_fwd_flag
fields.doc: This flag indicates whether the trip record was held in vehicle memory before sending to the vendor, aka “store and forward,” because the vehicle did not have a connection to the server. Y: store and forward trip N: not a store and forward trip

fields.name: dropoff_longitude
fields.doc: Longitude where the meter was disengaged.

fields.name: dropoff_latitude
fields.doc: Latitude where the meter was disengaged.

fields.name: payment_type
fields.doc: A numeric code signifying how the passenger paid for the trip. 1: Credit card 2: Cash 3: No charge 4: Dispute 5: Unknown 6: Voided trip

fields.name: fare_amount
fields.doc: The time-and-distance fare calculated by the meter.

fields.name: extra
fields.doc: Miscellaneous extras and surcharges. Currently, this only includes the $0.50 and $1 rush hour and overnight charges.

fields.name: mta_tax
fields.doc: $0.50 MTA tax that is automatically triggered based on the metered rate in use.

fields.name: improvement_surcharge
fields.doc: $0.30 improvement surcharge assessed trips at the flag drop. The improvement surcharge began being levied in 2015.

fields.name: tip_amount
fields.doc: Tip amount – This field is automatically populated for credit card tips. Cash tips are not included.

fields.name: tolls_amount
fields.doc: Total amount of all tolls paid in trip.

fields.name: total_amount
fields.doc: The total amount charged to passengers. Does not include cash tips.
